item.title: More investors want public and private assets in their portfolio. Now there's a benchmark to track this combo
item.description: Morningstar announced the Modern Market 100, the first framework to combine public and private equity exposure in one index.

item.title: Record share of U.S. businesses divert China investments. Top choice: Southeast Asia
item.description: Southeast Asia remained the most popular destination for redirected investments, followed by the Indian subcontinent.

item.title: Alibaba leads $100 million investment in Chinese humanoid robot startup
item.description: Capital is rushing into humanoids â€” X Square Robot has completed eight fundraising rounds in less than two years since the startup was founded.

item.title: Klarna prices IPO at $40, above online lender's expected range
item.description: Klarna priced its IPO at $40 a share, an offering that values the company at about $15 billion.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves after hours: Oracle, GameStop, Synopsys and more
item.description: See which stocks are posting big moves after the bell.
